title: ICornerReliefFeatureData.GetCorners
description: Gets all corners of the specified type in this corner relief feature.

parameters.name: CornerReliefType
parameters.description: Corner relief type as defined by swCornerReliefType_e

remarks: If CornerReliefType is specified with -1, then this method retrieves corners of all types.
